name: Basics
description: Widgets you absolutely need to know before building your first Flutter app.

name: Material 2 Components
pagecontent: Flutter will make Material 3 (M3), the latest version of Material Design, the default in late 2023. Check out our M3 widget catalog now.

name: Material Components
description:
Visual, behavioral, and motion-rich widgets implementing the Material 3 design specification.

Material 3 becomes the default Flutter interface in late 2023. To learn more about this transition, check out Flutter support for Material 3.
pagecontent:
To opt into Material 3, set the useMaterial3 flag to true in your theme.

To catch these widgets in action, check out our live Material 3 demo app.

You can still check out our legacy Material 2 widgets over at their catalog page.

name: Cupertino (iOS-style widgets)
description: Beautiful and high-fidelity widgets for current iOS design language.

name: Layout
description: Arrange other widgets columns, rows, grids, and many other layouts.

subcategories.name: Single-child layout widgets
subcategories.description: These widgets take a single child and manipulate the layout of the child.

subcategories.name: Multi-child layout widgets
subcategories.description: These widgets take multiple children and arrange them in different ways.

subcategories.name: Sliver widgets
subcategories.description: These widgets take a portion of a CustomScrollView and apply a layout to that portion.

name: Assets, Images, and Icons
description: Manage assets, display images, and show icons.

name: Input
description: Take user input in addition to input widgets in Material Components and Cupertino.

name: Interaction Models
description: Respond to touch events and route users to different views.

name: Styling
description: Manage the theme of your app, makes your app responsive to screen sizes, or add padding.

name: Painting and effects
description: These widgets apply visual effects to the children without changing their layout, size, or position.

name: Async
description: Async patterns to your Flutter application.

name: Scrolling
description: Scroll multiple widgets as children of the parent.
